website_summaries.verdict: The best budget bezel-less display with a high build quality and great screen responsiveness.
pros: The monitor sports several features to increase gaming performance and response rate
Enhanced coloring and contrast provide a sharper image
cons: The built-in audio lacks advanced settings and controls commonly available on other options

customer_reviews.title: A $100 Mistake
customer_reviews.text: This monitor was fine... for a while. It's been 3 months, with light use, and now it doesn't work at all. First the screen started to flicker - I figured it was because of the adaptor I had to use to connect it to my Macbook Pro (it only has USB-c ports). But now it won't get any signal, I just have a black screen. I tried connecting it to an old PC I have w/ a VGA connection and... still no signal. Tried a different VGA cable - NO SIGNAL. So it's definitely the monitor. I definitely don't recommend this. I consider it a $100 mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylynne H.

customer_reviews.title: I am extremely disappointed in this product and would not recommend it
customer_reviews.text: We've had this monitor less than 6 months and it's already failing. Less than 5 in use. Starting from the right top corner to the lower left corner the screen has developed a dark shadow. The shadow gets darker as you use it. I am extremely disappointed in this product and would not recommend it. The warranty was apparently for 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: terry

customer_reviews.title: Good for price, but is wobbly
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor! For the price, it’s not bad at all. The picture isn’t as nice as looking at the screen of my MacBook Pro and you can definitely see the individual pixels, but it doesn’t bother me. It is wobbly like the other reviews have mentioned (that’s why I rated it 4 stars and not 5), but I left the clear plastic on the piece that inserts into the base to give it more traction and also have it sitting on a table directly next to my desk, and that decreases the wobbling. It does its job though, and it lets me work more efficiently so I can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Coffeegirl

customer_reviews.title: Good looking monitor, lacks HDMI
customer_reviews.text: I've used around 100 of these bad boys in a couple of call centers hooking them up to mac minis. They look great, but are a pain to assemble and get all of the little plastic wrapping off of if you're going to use a lot of them. Pros: Image looks great Can be used without the base with it's little kickstand thing if you're into that sort of thing. It matches well with a mac mini. Cons: Doesn't have an HDMI input. Stand is a little on the flimsy side. Un-packaging these is very time consuming, more parts than the average monitor because of the little kickstand thing.
customer_reviews.author: chrislebaron

customer_reviews.title: Fixed it!
customer_reviews.text: Fixed the mysterious shaded box in the upper left corner by turning off the 'bright frame' in the options menu. So now the mysterious box as depicted in the images I've uploaded is gone. As a result I'm giving my review 4 stars, -1 for not having a HDMI input but for me not having a HDMI input is not a deal breaker and all is well in the world at least at the moment!
customer_reviews.author: Sac7000

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is excellent. Like other reviewers, the bezel described is the small plastic frame around the frame of the monitor, but the actual image has an additional amount of black border around the top and sides, but it is still only 1/4" total (including the 2 mm). The images, color, etc. are amazing, which is surprising for the price of this monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 ratio on whether or not they last longer than a few months
customer_reviews.text: Bought 6 months ago and the monitor is flickering badly. I have 2 of these, hopefully the other holds out, I like them, but they have like no warranty apparently. Other reviews say the same. Great monitor if you dont get one of the bad ones.
customer_reviews.author: ITGuru

customer_reviews.title: Alright But Not Exceptional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor during the holidays for a new desktop build mainly based on the previous ratings. It's a clean looking 1080p monitor with VGA and DVI connectors. The power connector seems somewhat chintzy (it's not the standard three prong cables and has an external brick). The stand it comes with doesn't feel exceptionally solid but works, and there are no holes for VESA mounting. After connecting the monitor to the desktop, Windows Update pulled an updated driver for it immediately. After adjusting the settings, contrast was great, color was decent, but it still just isn't quite bright enough.
customer_reviews.author: IT and Coffee

customer_reviews.title: Not very slim
customer_reviews.text: I want to leave a comment here because I bought this with an idea in mind and it doesnt work for what I'd hoped. This monitor is listed as slim but because of the back mounting bracket you cant mount it flushly anywhere it also doesn't have a VESA mounting bracket. While the top of the monitor is slim the bottom is pretty far and then rounded stand mount protrudes so far it isnt really very slim at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Torkkola

customer_reviews.title: Good HD Monitor and Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I needed an HD monitor for use with my laptop decided on this AOC based on the price and reviews. I'm very happy with it! The picture is beautiful, very crisp and clear. I tried the sound and worked very well, but don't use it much so that I don't disturb other folks at work. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C Swanson

customer_reviews.title: LCD panel weight overstrains mount making it tilt inward a bit. Some color issues.
customer_reviews.text: The price pretty much tells it. As a slave unit I could see using it. I compensated to get the panel axis straight 90degs. I saw some red hue invading the white areas, close to objects in view, which did not show on my other units. Could be just the one I received. 3yr warranty is only 1 year for the panel?? Didn't try speakers, didn't need them.
customer_reviews.author: Soundlubber

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality is excellent and the monitor is very clean-looking
customer_reviews.text: This is an initial reaction review, I will update it in a few months if any problems arise. For the price, I'm really not sure this monitor can be beat. The picture quality is excellent and the monitor is very clean-looking. The frameless aesthetics are awesome however don't be fooled, there IS a bezel underneath the screen, though it is thin (~1/4" I would say). The screen has a matte finish and does get some glare from direct light, otherwise no problems with visibility. PROS: Price can't be beat Awesome color clarity Sleek, frameless design Tiltable CONS: No VESA mounting Not height adjustable Base is not as sturdy as others No HDMI in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this monitor, the best part was that it could sit on my desk without a stand so it wasn't so much strain for my eyes and neck to look up. But unfortunately mine had a defect so I returned it and got another one. I didn't know it didn't have HTML when I bought it, so I decided to go with one that had HTML so I didn't have to use an adapter, but I can't say the picture quality is any different, and sort of wish I'd have exchanged it.
customer_reviews.author: PennyLQ4

customer_reviews.title: AOC I2267FW 22 Horizonal Scew
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to say, if you receive one or more of these (I just had two in a row) that have the horizontal position off by about a half inch, go to Extra and turn on the setting "Auto Config". Leave the menu and it will self correct. I almost sent these back thinking something was wrong. Hope this helps someone.
customer_reviews.author: phlibby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome monitor for great price
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed at the quality of this monitor for this price point. It has a wide brightness/contrast adjustment range. I was initially worried that it was going to be too bright next to my other monitor but I got them to match pretty closely after some calibration. The screen is not vertically adjustable but can tilt up and down. The only complaint I have, and it's minor, is that all the buttons are on the back of the monitor, so it makes it difficult to navigate the OSD menus quickly. In my case, once I got it set where I wanted I don't anticipate having to mess with the buttons again anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Ramón

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor For Price And Size
customer_reviews.text: As many other reviewers have stated, this monitor is not borderless as advertised. When it is powered on it has about a half inch of black border. When turned off the monitor does appear to be borderless. The monitor looks very modern and stylish and doesn't take up too much space on the desktop. I plugged it in and adjusted the monitor's color settings and it looks beautiful. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a budget IPS monitor in the 22" class range. Setup: Dell Inspiron laptop running Windows 10, HDMI to DVI-D cable
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this monitor. I bought this for my desktop, and I love the look and performance of this screen. It is very sleek and looks nice in a setup do to it being frameless. The colors are very vibrant and the IPS (In-Plane-Switching) works well. This monitor was plug and play for my PC, so I didn't have to install any software or anything else to use it. I would recommend this monitor as a gaming or casual monitor. Two of these on a setup would most likely look nice, and would give good performance. I was hesitant on buying this as it didn't have an HDMI port, but DVI works well and adapters can work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: 2mm unless you are talking about an actual display
customer_reviews.text: Misleading. " ultra-narrow bezel measures just 2mm, for a borderless appearance " It's just a normal screen with the front face of the bezel cut off. dumb as hell.The actual panel has a built in border that is about 1cm wide as expected. Out of curiosity I tried increasing active pixels on each side by one and it just said "input not support". Great english guys. Personally I would have gone with "Oh no you EDIDn't!"
customer_reviews.author: Richard Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand...never have complaints!
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. I've bought AOC before and have never had a single complaint. It's large, stylish, lightweight, super easy to put together and functions perfectly. You can't get a better product for a better price, as far as I'm concerned. I use it with my Mac and it works beautifully. No need to install anything (meaning drivers or even the disc they send with it)...just plug it in and go!
customer_reviews.author: Equus

customer_reviews.title: I liked the monitor when I first got it
customer_reviews.text: I liked the monitor when I first got it, as everything was fine. About two months into using it, I noticed 3 or so dead pixels in the top left corner. Alright, not that big of a deal, it happens to the best monitors, usually a shipping problem. Now it's 5 months in, and I have a vertical line of dead pixels showing up on the right side of the screen (exact opposite side, thus unrelated to 3 dead pixels). I'm now fairly convinced that the panel is faulty, but I'm well outside the return period through amazon. Be careful buying this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Tallis

customer_reviews.title: Good display, but a wobbly monitor, and the menu/adjustment buttons are awkward to use.
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is wobbly, and the menu/power buttons are in an awkward position. I don't think I'll go through the trouble of returning it, but I'd rather have spent an extra $20 or so to get a sturdier monitor with buttons that aren't as awkward to use (though I never gave thought to the buttons before now). The display is nice and sharp as one would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Overall great monitor
customer_reviews.text: The back of the monitor is actually pretty cheap looking and the buttons are definitely super cheap. I was unimpressed when I saw and tried to use them. That being said, they work and who ever looks at the back? The front looks great and the stand is sufficient. The stand is actually kinda weird and in my opinion unnecessary design. Anyway, this still deserves 4 stars because the display is pretty amazing especially for the price. I plan on buying 2 more to go right next to the one I already have! PS Lack of HDMI is kinda a bummer but who really cares? DVI-D is the same quality cable.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Best buy on Amazon in my purchase history
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps my best purchase on Amazon, ever! Totally love it for about 18 reasons. Brilliant, as the British would say. I went to buy another tonight . . . Surprise, surprise, as Gomer Pyle/Jim Neighbors would say ( Google it, millennials :) Price has shot up 25% since last week . . .
customer_reviews.author: Inside man

customer_reviews.title: Great Viewing
customer_reviews.text: This is without a doubt a great little monitor for a budget build. It is not completely frameless but close enough. Image displayed is exceptional and without issues. Great for reading as the IPS provides a crisp and clean fonts. While not designed for gaming it's a great purchase. Extremely pleased with it's performance.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I got an AOC monitor for my wife after reading great reviews and she loves her. So I got this one for me. I like it. Performs well and has great colors and image. Reason I gave it only 4 stars: It is sold as bezel-less, but that's not true. The glass is edge to edge, but the bezel is behind the glass, so when on, it looks just like a regular LCD. So, because of that lie, I can only give it 4 stars. Otherwise, it is a great monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler A. Newton

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is amazing for the price, the colors are not too dull or oversaturated, the sharpness is right on point. I love how you can detach the stand and use it as a small secondary monitor, it does collect dust faster than other monitors that ive had but that's just a small thing. Overall this monitor is great for the price and is worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: KyleB

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is a great monitor for the price. The set up was a little confusing because the instructions (on the outside of the package, no set up instruction sheet was included) was for a different monitor with more cables than the one that I bought. Once I realized that the picture was wrong, I just set it up myself and it was fine. The power button is in a weird place (at the back of the monitor) but it works well and that's the main thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kaszimir N. Togas-Arayn

customer_reviews.title: Great monitors, beautiful quality, VIDEO REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor, yes it does lack VESA mounting options but.. for the price, you can take a look at how to mount these on YouTube. The quality is gorgeous, and even the VGA input is great on them, its crystal clear compared to some other analog inputs on other brand monitors. Check out my video unboxing of this monitor here:  Thanks :)
customer_reviews.author: Reviews By Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great image and gameplay is outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice monitor. Good clean images and at great resolution. Gaming is great and videos are really clear. Really like the frameless design and am going to try to use a dual monitor setup for video editing. Would have liked to see it in an HDMI version but works very well with DVI. Would definitely recommend this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: M.P.

customer_reviews.title: but this is great. Also
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a little more "frameless" look, but this is great. Also, I wish the height was adjustable. I'll have to double-check that feature on future monitors. Update 1: 4 months in, and I have one dead pixel. I'll update if it spreads.
customer_reviews.author: jonnyd49

customer_reviews.title: I purchased a monitor on the cheaper end for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a monitor on the cheaper end for the purpose of keeping in the basement to have a display for the computers I'm repairing/building. It works as intended and I haven't had any problems with it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Gagner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is really close to the I2267FWH, which has additional speakers that is almost useless. There is a small seam of space between the edge of the monitor and display, but it is negligible unless you plan on using a dual setup. The best thing about this monitor is its capability to remove the stand and still use it. Although it will sit lower on the desk, it would save space on narrow desks. Do note that vesa mounting is not available unless you buy an extra adapter which would cost somewhere around 20-30 dollars. Hdmi/displayport is also unavailable, so you may need to get an adapter.
customer_reviews.author: EY

customer_reviews.title: I think two of these monitors would be a better choice than basically anything else in the 1080p market ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding monitor, bought based on the favorable reviews and the price. I think two of these monitors would be a better choice than basically anything else in the 1080p market for the money. Clean and sharp. 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: G Italiano

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Really good screen, it came in good condition, and I've had it for over 3 years now and it's still going strong. Good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: he seems to like it. Though I personally am not a huge ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my Father, he seems to like it. Though I personally am not a huge fan of the colors or the lack of brightness. That being said it is a good basic monitor for price, and it looks better than Dell low end units I have purchased directly from Dell.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Mast

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should. Very good quality and design for price.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived without problems, no dead pixels, no shortages in the cords, no cosmetic faults. Tested it for a couple hours off my laptop and it ran good. Hope it gives me at least 3 years plus. If not, will edit review accordingly as for now its a good buy, worth the money. Would recommend to someone for a starter pc setup.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: No HDMI (pictures updated)
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I needed this monitor to have was a HDMI port, and though the pictures showed it DID, it does not. They've updated the pictures at this point, but I will be requesting a return on this item. The 2 stars is for the seller, not the product.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip S.

customer_reviews.title: Sharp.
customer_reviews.text: These AOC monitors put out some vibrant sharp images. I had a 27 inch and bumped down to this because of limited space and I am not disappointed at all. I do wish it had an HDMI port. That the biggest downside to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jagged

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy!
customer_reviews.text: SO easy to install and up and running in 5 min. Looks great, light weight, super thin and so far works great -- as a second monitor for my new iMac.
customer_reviews.author: Bucks&Smokey

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these guys about a year ago now. I just couldn't find a better deal for a decent monitor at 1920x1080. My main requirement was "small bezel" or "thin bezel", of which this has very little - it's about a half inch around the outside edge of the plastic frame. I'm colorblind but the image looks fine to me. This has a DC adapter for power and no VESA mount points.
customer_reviews.author: Justin R

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought it was gonna be
customer_reviews.text: Looks clean in person, better than I thought I was getting , no hdmi input tho if that what your looking for
customer_reviews.author: Tre

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for gaming!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 13 year old daughter for PC gaming and it is really nice and at a good price. It's a rimless design so the actual screen goes all the way to the edge on the sides and top. If you're looking for a nice monitor for your desk top this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: paul morrison

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: There's really nothing I don't like about this monitor. I use it for my home PC for some gaming, editing videos and all the normal internet stuff.
customer_reviews.author: G. D. Colburn

customer_reviews.title: It may have a low price...
customer_reviews.text: For the cost of this monitor you can't go wrong. The picture is pretty darn good, it's not 4k quality, but handles 1080p quite nicely. Also great for using video editing software as well as flight simulation. Pick up one or two today!
customer_reviews.author: FlightSim Productions

customer_reviews.title: For the price I am very happy with the monitors
customer_reviews.text: For the price I am very happy with the monitors. There are certainly higher resolution monitors out there but for the price you cant beat these. I purchased 2 for the pc I built and plan on purchasing a 3rd down the road. I use it for work, but also play games like battlefield 4 on them.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Very comparable to its rivals.
customer_reviews.text: Works well and looks sleek. Not a big fan of the behind the monitor buttons, wish it was at least on the side like some Dell monitors. Brightness set at 70 was bright enough. For $100 monitor, it works well. This monitor is very comparable to the ASUS MX238H for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ju-Miao Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a new computer build and they're great. The matte finish is amazing so is the 1080p. Only wished they took more video ports (only VGA and DVI, no HDMI or DP) and had a vesa mount.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Neckbeard

customer_reviews.title: Great for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Great solution for my budget PC build. Just needed an inexpensive monitor and this fit the bill. I didn't need anything spectacular but just basically picked out this monitor strictly on price. Don't get the terms frameless and borderless confused if you consider purchasing this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: guru

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase - Still reliable products
customer_reviews.text: I've had AOC monitors for nearly 5 years. My first one bit the dust the other night thanks to some cat antics. So I immediately replaced it with new one in the same size. This monitor has great color; very bright and vibrant. Great price. Wish they were this affordable 5 years ago! I'd probably have more than 2 :)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This fit perfect in between the shelves
customer_reviews.text: I have an old computer desk with an opening in the middle and shelves on both sides. This fit perfect in between the shelves. The description says frameless but there is a 1/4 inch frame all around. The picture is great and I really like the monitor. I wish it really was frameless but not enough to return the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Picture, leans to the left on a flat and level table.
customer_reviews.text: I own this displays slightly larger 23.6 inch brother. I got this as another external monitor for my MBPr. Picture looks good, and I like the look of the monitor. As other people have said, though, the display doesn't sit quite level on a table, the display leans to the left for me. This monitor isn't VESA mountable either.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: For the sub 100 cost this is a great purchase 7/16th inch of border before the screen edge
customer_reviews.text: For the sub 100 cost this is a great purchase 7/16th inch of border before the screen edge, so ok slim bezel but not awesome. No vesa mount, but has decent tilt. The four button for navigating the menus is hard to get used to Used 6 months no issues, bought second one later Con: has external power brick.
customer_reviews.author: Avid amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: Super clear and sharp image
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these, and am definitely impressed. They blow anything I saw at BestBuy away for nearly half as much. Super clear and sharp image, great stand, and beautiful design.
customer_reviews.author: BradFoxUS

customer_reviews.title: Got two of these puppies, love em'
customer_reviews.text: As everyone says the pics are inaccurate, the image does not go to the edge of the screen. However I knew this before I bought and I love these. I got two of them, the picture is simply awesome, the power draw is nice and low. My only gripe is build quality, they seem flimsy and there is no vesa mount. The stand however is simple, but seems to work very nice.
customer_reviews.author: MoonMan

customer_reviews.title: almost like a miniature version of a snake skin
customer_reviews.text: Product was defective. There was this really noticeable pattern in the middle of the screen, almost like a miniature version of a snake skin. It didn't show from the sides of the monitors, but when looked at directly from the front, it was quite noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea I could get such a WONDERFUL LED COMPUTER SCREEN for such a low price (and bought through the Warehouse Deals which I always try to do). Why did I wait so long. What a difference....not even counting the lower energy bill because of the LED. I even watched a movie on it....wow, wow, wow.....and very sexy in appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Littledee

customer_reviews.title: Great AOC Monitor, Well built.
customer_reviews.text: Nice picture, purchased two of these monitors to have side by side having no big bulky trim is nice for having two monitors next to each other. AOC in my opinion makes some of the nicest looking monitors and they are well built. The buttons on the back are out of the way and hard to use but they include the software to adjust all monitor settings right on your pc and gives you the option to control 4 monitors at the same time, so I just kind of forget that there are even buttons on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, not at all borderless. Tedious buttons
customer_reviews.text: I love the monitor, and it is great for gaming, but it really bugs me that it said that it was borderless and there is a good 5mm of black on each side. The buttons are also very awkward and hard to use. I've had no issues with dead pixels or any display problems, but I was a bit disappointed in the border and the buttons.
customer_reviews.author: marzbarz

customer_reviews.title: Like I feel like I have a 1440p monitor instead ...
customer_reviews.text: Image is crisper than my last 1080p monitor. Like I feel like I have a 1440p monitor instead of 1080p. Very thin bezel, about a quarter inch on each side. So it is just half inch gap if you put 2 side by side. Which is good because most monitors have legit almost an inch of bezel on each side. And then you end up with a almost 2 inch gap. This monitor, great for all around use. I play games, I also record and make thumbnails in PhotoShop and edit. And the colors are amazing to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Everything I want from a monitor. There's tons if competition for IPS monitors in this size and price range, which is great. My feeling is that they are all quite similar, it's just an issue of ports and minor aesthetic changes and mostly price. Anti-glare is nice for work.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality
customer_reviews.text: I use 3 of those. I do a lot of gaming and absolutely love the colors on this monitor. I set up 3 monitors and I am yet to be disappointed. The quality is outstanding. Great monitor for the price. I like that the frame is very small so it fits well next to other screen.
customer_reviews.author: Volodymyr Kubatskyy

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality, but it is a cheap monitor. and it does work, so... oh, NO HDMI in the back, or anywhere, you will have to get an adapter if you have that. Again, very, very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Larry B.

customer_reviews.title: If You Are Getting This For Gaming This Monitor When ...
customer_reviews.text: If You Are Getting This For Gaming This Monitor When I Got It Ha a Major Lg for when You Receive Messages or if someone Joins My Party It Wouldn't Show Up<><> P.S. You'll Need a Cable To Game On It<><>
customer_reviews.author: Jake Moxley

customer_reviews.title: Buy your own DVI cable now, its a good price/ips monitor
customer_reviews.text: I'm just adding a 5 star so people know its not junk Pros: - Cheap - 1080p - IPS - Slim bezel Cons: - Didn't come with a DVI cable - Only DVI and VGA inputs
customer_reviews.author: Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Not entirely satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: The monitor itself is pretty good. I'm not a fan of the buttons on the back, and it's a pretty immovable monitor stand, as there isn't really any adjustability. The software that comes with it is pretty lackluster; it runs poorly on the computer, and seems as if it's borderline spyware.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great, At first
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months the screen is having problems. For example if there was a darker picture with a white spot in the middle, the whiteness of the spot fades out left and right all the way across the screen, like horizontal bleeding of color. Otherwise love it
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend. I just got 1 to plug into my laptop (you will need an adapter), and I am never going back to having 1 screen. The resolution and picture quality is great. I was really sad when I got my first scratch on the screen, but mistakes happen, so if you are accident prone like me, keep sharp things away from this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: Nice and bright. Almost too big for me but it's my desk size. Great deal for about $100. My Son has these at his work and has not had a problem since he purchased them. They are on there 12 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Dewitt

customer_reviews.title: Super nice monitor!!! AOC 12267w 21.5
customer_reviews.text: My first pc monitor buy. I built a gameing computer for my son it went well and the monitor look's spectacular and does well with games. I would recommend anyone on a budget To buy this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Misleading.
customer_reviews.text: The bezels are bigger than you think, I wish it had HDMI. Other that that, it's a great monitor. Adjustable, good OSD, very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Ciali

customer_reviews.title: Screen and adaptor
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you read all the specifics. This does not have a usb. I had to purchase and adaptor to use with my computer. The screen blanks out for a few seconds. I can deal with it as this is a second monitor, but it's annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Wish it utilized HDMI but buying DVI to HDMI cable to be compatible with my 1070GTX was inexpensive. I own 3 of these monitors. All from Amazon. For the price, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Downtown

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for it's price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive but yet decent monitor. This one meets my expectations. I have been using it for a few months now and quality is good enough. I have had Dell Monitors before and I can barely tell the difference in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique P.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product, would recommend investing a few more dollars ...
customer_reviews.text: We've purches 6 monitors and 3 have failed. Not a good product, would recommend investing a few more dollars and applying it to a better monitor.
customer_reviews.author: SHYC

customer_reviews.title: Set up was easy and customized the video settings as I do on ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the AOC I2267FW 22-Inch Class IPS Frameless/Slim LED Monitor. Set up was easy and customized the video settings as I do on all the new monitors I get. Very pleased with the result. <<< UPDATE: Sept. 14, 2020 >>> Still working great, nice picture quality, no issues. Have been using it in home office since 2017 as a Win7 monitor and a TV using a Hauppage WinTV-HVR 955Q Hybrid TV Stick, Windows Media Center, and a flat panel antenna that picks up local HD channels.
customer_reviews.author: Ashorn Family

customer_reviews.title: So far so good love the look of these monitors got 2 of ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good love the look of these monitors got 2 of them will probably order a 3rd. when screen is off it looks like there is not bezel but when on the bezel is clearly seen but thin enough it does not bother me. still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great compromise of price and quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this for viewing high-res photos and homework for school, mostly excel. Great resolution and a good size!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Power

customer_reviews.title: AOC makes great monitors!
customer_reviews.text: I knew this but forgot it along the way. The AOC i2267fw reminded me of the company's brilliance.. The broad range of inputs, responsiveness and overall ease of assembly maje it easy to love. Vibrant colors on that bigger-than-you-think IPS display make this an easy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Larry A.

customer_reviews.title: Screen quality is good, but NO HDMI port.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for a sibling, so I don't use it myself. The user likes the image quality, but please note - there is NO HDMI port on this model.
customer_reviews.author: Riverguy

customer_reviews.title: Really cant go wrong with these if your on a budget.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly a great display, Never been a fan of AOC in the past but these edge to edge IPS displays are great visual quality for the money. I bought 6 of them and no issues yet.
customer_reviews.author: Fizzybubbly

customer_reviews.title: easy assembly, and great product overall
customer_reviews.text: Sleek design, easy assembly, and great product overall! I got two of these for a dual monitor setup and it fits perfectly with my all white and blue theme. If you buy this, you definitely might want to purchase some speakers. I put some music on MAX volume and can BARELY hear anything. Other than that, pretty good deal.
customer_reviews.author: mteav

customer_reviews.title: I've been using it for 4 or 5 months and so far my experience has been great. I had to adjust some visual settings to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have this monitor hooked up with my iMac as a second display. I've been using it for 4 or 5 months and so far my experience has been great. I had to adjust some visual settings to get it to my liking, but other then that, this monitor was a good purchase. EDIT: Recommend this monitor to a friend, and he has been enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: A.M

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great screen for my needs. I now own two. Shipped quickly and everything arrived on time. Comes with a VGA and power cable. Monitor has a DVI and a VGA outs, but not HDMI.
customer_reviews.author: Jdn55

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor-Great Design
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and stylish design. Not having the large frame around the screen is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy

customer_reviews.title: This monitor was much smaller in height than was expected ...
customer_reviews.text: This monitor was much smaller in height than was expected. Sidebar by side with my other monitor it is at least 3 full inches shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Part Missing
customer_reviews.text: Part was missing to connect monitor to stand. Couldn't even try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. I will post pictures and more feedback upon request.
customer_reviews.text: So, the quality of video it gives is great (compared to my old monitor). I love the way the monitors (I ordered 2) look. They are all around great. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Best Monitor for Photography/
customer_reviews.text: IPS monitors are the best for photo editing and graphic design. I run these in pairs and calibrate with the Sypder 5pro.
customer_reviews.author: Davinphx

customer_reviews.title: For no HDMI Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: For a product that has no HDMI, it's still clear screen an looks good overall. I like you can angle it a bit, and the frame is a good material.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Gordon

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Monitor looks great. Shipping came a day earlier than estimated date. My only complaint is that the VGA cable seems to be broken. Not sure how it's supposed to work, but I've connected the monitor and my pc using the cable yet the monitor doesn't display anything. Right now, I'm using a DVI cable I bought separately and the monitor works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tennyson Lu

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice monitor
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice monitor. Almost bezel-less but definitely not borderless. Screen doesn't go all the way to the bezels. BUT the borders are still very minimal. I enjoy the design of this but wish the screen went to the bezels
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Sleek design
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a second display monitor for home office to use with my work PC. Clean, sleek look. Very thin and takes up little space on my desk. Came quickly and was easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Reba

customer_reviews.title: Display is great, just wish I had read the details
customer_reviews.text: Display is great, just wish I had read the details...no HDMI, which we had to then buy an adapter for. Just an oversight on our part that led to a minor set back.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this screen, I'm going to take one more, great seller fast service. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Monica Oro

customer_reviews.title: Will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These are A+++ all around . Will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: jacob gindi

customer_reviews.title: Its Great
customer_reviews.text: I use this for mild gaming and browsing and it looks great ! Usually spend an hour or hour and half on it and its pretty easy on the eyes. Would get another one if I had the space.
customer_reviews.author: Eric C.

customer_reviews.title: The border is so thin its like its not even there
customer_reviews.text: Sexy little cheap display. The border is so thin its like its not even there. Works great for multi monitor setups.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Use it for my daughter's Xbox360 so she doesn't hog the tv.
customer_reviews.author: CheshyreCat

customer_reviews.title: My bad for not reading carefully
customer_reviews.text: No HDMI connection, only has old school HDCP port. My bad for not reading carefully. Works fine, but had to buy adapter cable.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Reeh

customer_reviews.title: Dead Pixels
customer_reviews.text: In just a month and a half of using this monitor I have dead pixels in the middle of the screen. Had been a truly wonderful unit prior to this. Extremely disappointed. Here's to hoping their customer service is reasonable as I am planning on contacting them today.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Maguire

product_meta.title: AOC I2267FW 22-Inch Class IPS Frameless/Slim LED Monitor, Full HD,250 cd/m2 Brightness,5ms,50M:1 DCR,VGA/DVI
product_meta.description: I2267FW - 22? 16:9 LED LCD IPS Monitor with 1920 x 1080 Resolution
feature_bullets: 22" (21.5" viewable) display, 250 cd/m2 Brightness, 5ms Response Time
1920 x 1080 Full HD Resolution, 50M:1 MEGA Dynamic Contrast Ratio
IPS panel for consistent image appearance from all viewing positions, 2mm ultra-narrow bezel for virtually borderless appearance
Detachable multi-purpose stand for standard or photo frame applications, 16:9 Aspect Ratio
